E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Ken Henderson
Dear Sir,
Ken Henderson has an AVG of .330 at AA El Paso Diablos!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Eric Raich
Dear Sir,
Eric Raich has nothing more to prove at A Quad Cities Angels!
He has an ERA of 2.68 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Starting pitcher

Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Fred Scherman
